docs.abstract: David Brat, Randolph-Macon College economics professor who defeated Rep Eric Cantor in Republican primary, will now face off against Democratic candidate Jack Trammel, campus colleague who teaches sociology; before two men became overnight political rivals, they knew each other best as teammates on faculty basketball squad.
